content: introducing the granny stripes crochet shorts an original design by shylercrochets these stunning shorts feature the classic granny crochet stitch seamlessly combining vertical and horizontal stripes to create a unique and eye-catching pattern designed to be breathable and lacy these shorts are perfect for warm summer days crafted with versatility in mind the granny stripes crochet shorts can be made to any length ensuring a perfect fit for everyone when worked in cotton yarn they provide a lightweight and comfortable wear making them an essential addition to your summer wardrobe elevate your crochet collection with this timeless design and enjoy the satisfaction of creating your own pair with our detailed written pattern available on all our online shops embrace the beauty and comfort of handmade with the granny stripes crochet shorts by shylercrochets to follow along with a video tutorial https //youtu be/xb_2uc1o_ay materials hook 4mm scissors measuring tape yarn winterking 4 ply acrylic 3 colors 150 yards for each of the first 2 colors 200 yards for the main color total amount of yarn used approximately 500 yards darning needle matching mandala crochet top http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mandala-halter-top this listing is for a pdf file not for physical product by purchasing this digital pattern you acknowledge that you have read this disclaimer and that you will receive a digital file refunds will not be accepted
